> These unit tests can be run in any sequence, however: I'd like to specify
> that the unit tests for the lower level APIs should be run first.
> When these tests pass, the higher level APIs can be tested, having some
> confidence that the lower level works.

JUnit-addons has an OrderedTestSuite that could solve your problem.  The 
tests are "alphabetically" executed.

I haven't test the class for Suite of Suites but it should work.  Send 
me your feedback if you have problems.

JUnit-addons website: <http://junit-addons.sourceforge.net>

-Vladimir
